Review.Titre: Site was very easy to navigate
Review.Contenu: Site was very easy to navigate, research and purchase what I wanted.  The shipping is fast and they communicate with their customers to make sure they're happy with their buy.
Excellent product selection.  Great website experience. Arrived on time.

I left my items in my cart while I was giving it time to simmer in my head. I was sent an email saying my items have been reserved for me and was also given a discount, and that made it very tempting. I didn't realize that I added the wrong color for the WA7 Fireflies in my cart. I emailed them back and and said I have to test them out first at CanJam SoCal, and if they can change the WA7 Fireflies to black.The change was simple enough, I left the items in my cart and headed to Irvine. I came back after 5 days, my discount was still there and completed the purchase. I selected the overnight shipping, but since I made the purchase around 8 PM I knew it'd take two days.Been enjoying my Meze Liric and Woo Audio WA7 Fireflies since. ^_^

What made it great was your user friendly web page and the variety of selections offered. It was easy to pick a product and order it. I received my Focal Elegia Headphones and love em. Hope you will have a call in service for questions in addition to the email option in the future. Love your YouTube Videos!

Review.Titre: Truly Amazing Headphones - 7 Star Customer Support
Review.Contenu: I was considering a few headphones before deciding on this one. I have to mention Sam Cooper for providing me with the necessary information and his own perspective for me to decide on one. On top of that he was really helpful in resolving a payment hiccup and made sure my order gets shipped the same day. I live in Canada and I got the headset delivered the very next day. It did not feel like an open box item in any way.Now about the headset. This was my first “audiophile grade” headset. The first impression was okay, I tried paying few songs from Tidal via AAC, and used the DAC mode too. It was really good but honestly I couldn’t really tell what all those reviewers were saying about it being truly amazing. I’ve heard about headphones burn in periods and decided to give it a try by playing pink noise for like 20 hours. Maybe it’s placebo but I could feel it being better. But all that changed when I decided to watch the new Gran Turismo movie with it. It was absolutely incredible, unlike anything I’ve experienced before. It never felt like I was watching a movie with headphones on. I highly recommend the Bathys especially with the open box pricing.
Headphones.com is my only go-to place for all my audio needs. Great products, even greater prices, and the absolute BEST customer care. I will never purchase from anywhere else.

Overall pretty good, found what I needed got what I needed and it arrived within a couple days. No real changes I'd even have in mind tbh. Although if I'm being a bit selfish some cheeky little coupon codes once in a good while would be awesome lol

I’ve purchased 3 headphones from here and have returned 2. Not because they were bad but because they just didn’t suit my needs. I love their return policy, yes they charge a restock fee, but it’s a fair price for what they’re offering.
The ordering process was easy.  My order arrived in two days and was packed well.  I will buy from Headphones.com again.

Review.Titre: Headphones were exactly as I expected
Review.Contenu: Headphones were exactly as I expected. Gorgeous! The price was far better than competitors. I will definitely be doing business with them in the future.

I want the best in a low price and after much searching i got headphones.com which recommended by one of my friends. I’m really satisfied, also going to gift a headphone to my that friend.

I bought the Dunu SA6 MKii IEM's at an open box price. They shipped me a brand new set at the same price. I had problems with the sound quality and was almost at the point of returning the headphones until I found the right EQ tune that woke them up. Headphones.com were supportive through the process and willing to take the set back. Highly recommend to any purchaser. A+
Fast service, good prices, and support solves problems more than fair for customers.

Headphones.com is doing it right. I bought a pair of closed back headphones from Headphones.com.  They sounded great but were too confining. I really like the new pair and completely recommend Headphones.com to everyone. Terrific customer service.

Review.Titre: Headphone.com a great place to shop

Thieaudio Monarch MKIII,  What can be said, it is better then my 52y/o ears can hear!!!  They are a thing of pure beauty.  I got the disco backs so they look almost a good as they sound.  I think that they are as close to a perfect all around IEM that humankind can make.
